name: 孑游列国
description:
Game features:
■ The unique deck composition of living alone. By adding strategy, fortune or destiny to greatly increase the diversity of cards, you can match unique cards based on your preferences and needs, and add them to the deck.

■ There are multiple weapons for each profession to choose and use, and each weapon has different skills, which makes your cards more powerful and achieves the same effect as a tiger.
